result.arabic_text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا
result.translation: 9. Kaadu diggah, nanu ahak duma qaraanak elle daffeyna arooca luk sugne kay xaagu ankacisnuh, tokkel taway too xaagu ankacisam faxa num dabiitay kaa qambaala geele.
